climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Our Seventh Generation EasyDose Auto-Dosing Technology measures the right detergent amount—every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you’re done. One squeeze is all you need
Ultra concentrated, ultra-convenient liquid laundry detergent : 66 loads in a compact 23oz bottle that’s easy to store, and easy to feel good about
Small dose, big clean: 60 percent less plastic, 50 percent less water, and 75 percent lighter than our laundry detergent liquid 100 fl oz bottle
Our liquid laundry detergent advanced-enzyme formula fights even the most stubborn stains
Concentrated laundry detergent made with 0 percent dyes, synthetic fragrances, or artificial brighteners
body.description: Life is complicated. Laundry shouldn’t be. With Seventh Generation’s new EasyDose Ultra Concentrated Liquid Laundry Detergent, you get the right amount of liquid—every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you’re done. One squeeze is all you need! Our compact 23oz bottle gives you the same 66-load convenience you expect, but uses 60 percent less plastic, 50 percent less water, and is 75 percent lighter than our 100oz bottle. With a Rose scent made with 100 percent essential oils and botanical ingredients, and an advanced-enzyme formula that fights tough stains, it’s a great choice for your busy family. Easy to use, easy to store, and easy to love—our Ultra Concentrated Laundry Detergent is about to change the way you think about clean. Try with our Seventh Generation Dryer Sheets or our Liquid Fabric Softener! At Seventh Generation, we do business differently. We believe our products are healthy solutions for use within your home–and for the community and environment outside it. We are always evaluating how to reduce their environmental impact, increase performance and safety, and create a more sustainable supply chain. It is our responsibility to set a course for a more mindful way of doing business, where companies act as partners with other stakeholders to create a brighter future for the whole planet. Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation laundry soap washing detergent and both liquid and fabric softener sheets products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought a bottle of this and a few other clean eco friendly detergents to try back in Feb 13 2021. My fiance and I have only been using this since because I wanted to test each one out on its own until we’ve used them all. When we do laundry we usually do large loads and since we have an older washing machine it’s not energy efficient so we do two “doses” which would be two squirts I guess with its easy dose cap. Even though it doesn’t seem like it wouldn’t be enough it works great and we’ve both been really happy with this detergent. We each do a large load of clothes maybe every other week and clean towels and bedding just about as much so I thought we would have blown though such a tiny bottle by now. This is our first experience in a concentrated detergent so we were used to the big things of detergent and having to use a lot of it to get our laundry clean but this stuff has been doing great. We live in a pretty small apartment with not a lot of storage space so replacing a giant container of detergent for something more compact has been really nice. It also is a lot less of a hassle to dispense and we feel good about the ingredients in this too. We’ve been trying to be more conscious about the ingredients in the products we use and this was an easy transition from what we used before. I think now if we had to use regular detergent it would just feel wrong lol. Even though we thought we’d go though a whole bottle by now we still have a quarter left which exceeded our expectations. The one thing we noticed that was odd and weren’t used to was the fact our clothes had NO scent at all but they were clean. Usually we had some kind of scent on our laundry that gave it that “clean” smell and I’m sure it was clean but it was unnecessary and full of chemicals. I haven’t noticed any weird buildups or damage to our laundry from this product so I really appreciate that too lol. Overall I would really recommend this product theres so many positives with it and I don’t think I would ever want to go back to “traditional” detergent again. I also think is worth the cost, much easier to use, less messy, and takes up less space, and because it’s more concentrated you don’t need to use as much and it cuts cost on transportation. I think more products should be like this. Traditional detergents are watered down so it makes it heavier which in turn costs more money to transport it and it requires more plastic waste too. It’s just overall a great product in our opinion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars clean product with light rose scent
reviews.reviewText: I love the rose scent , very clean and not overwhelming.I love that it is concentrated and I only have to use a small amount and it is way easier than the large jugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for anyone w/ sensitive skin or chemical sensitivities --- works well in most machines & environmentally conscious
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as an alternative to Tide's Free & Gentle because the price at the time was significantly lower. While this is marketed as a baby laundry detergent product, the only child in my house is Lilly and she's a rabbit (and given she is potty trained, has fur, and cleans herself, I do not need laundry detergent for her.) More or less my need was for something that cleaned reasonably well but did not irritate my skin as certain dyes and fragrances can. Overall, this does what I need it to do and I think it is a good product.*From my own usage, I have found that Seventh Generation...---Does NOT irritate sensitive skin---Does NOT irritate asthma (despite it having some scent to it)---Does NOT leave any residue on clothes (which can lead to skin irritation)---Does NOT actively brighten colors (nor does it fade colors, either)---Does an OK job at removing stains (like Tide's product, I think it works very well for this sort of product designed with sensitivities in mind, but with that said I sometimes need to use some sort of a pre-treatment stain-remover for tougher stains, which I do not mind but wanted to note for someone who wants a true all-in-one product, as this is not it)---Does a good job at removing sweat stains (again taking into account how this is made for sensitivities instead of being an aggressive cleaner)---Does an excellent job at removing sweat odors---Works equally-well in front loading and side loading machines---Works equally-well in both standard and HE machines---Has a top cup design that is not very durable and does not hold up well to handling seen with shipping (some of mine occasionally arrive with a cracked cup)I figured I would list my observations individually in the event that certain ones apply to you more than others. But overall, 7th Gen works really well. As an added bonus, this is a product that is mindful of the environment, which is always a good thing. So whether you use this for babies or for someone with sensitive skin or for someone who prefers to avoid certain chemicals found in most detergents, this is a great product and it can often be had for a great price***..((((***Note that I have observed this is one of those products in which the price varies substantially, and shifts on a frequent basis...if you add this to your cart and monitor it over a few days or weeks, you may be able to get a better deal on it than the current pricing! *Also note that this stuff is super-concentrated, so dosing correctly is important [when I first got it, I did not believe such a tiny cap-full was sufficient for a full-load, but it was and is.]))))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love tis Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Seventh Generation products are one of my favorite cleaners to buy. Unfortunately, they are also one of the most expensive cleaning products out there! So, I can't always support them and our eco-friendly economy. I really like the smell of this laundry soap. It comes in a few varieties. Both are clean and pleasant. It also comes in an unscented for sensitive skin. Keep in mind that it is an ULTRA concentrated detergent so you don't have to use so much. I wish I could enjoy using it full-time to keep my clothes clean as it does a great job, but I'm on a budget. So sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well and full of clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I am NOT a fan of scented detergent or unclean ingredients. I've used this for years and love how gentle it is on my kids' sensitive skin and how well it cleans. I rest easy knowing it's made up of high quality ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our Family's Go-To Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Our family has been exclusively using this laundry detergent for the past year, and we are very pleased. It is highly concentrated and very easy to dispense. We use it for dirty sports uniforms, bedding, and delicate items....it works perfectly for all of them!We have had only one bottle that had a defective dispenser....the amount dispensed was not consistent. I simply had to closely pay attention for each load. Beyond that, the dispenser is great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Concentrated so less plastic, dosing saves money, clean laundry, no scent or skin reactions!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. Lasts much longer than other laundry soap because of the dosing bottle so it saves me money, is better for the environment due to smaller packaging, less water weight, less plastic, has no fragrance and nothing to bother our very sensitive skin. Plus is does a great job cleaning the laundry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does the job it's supposed to, but at at a far greater cost than it's worth. Despite my hopes that it would be a true rose scent, in fact it's not. I'm not certain what it smells like exactly - just that I find it nauseating. The easy dosing thing is a neat little gimmick, but that's all it is - seriously, when was the last time you stressed over your laundry detergent's dosage!

This is great soap. It has the slightest scent but it must be more natural because I have a bad scent sensitivity and this doesn't bother it!! Thankfully! I actually meant to get unscented but I am happy to know this one is okay for me too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells amazing and love that it's natural!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this detergent because I kept getting maskne due to COVID and I figured a more natural detergent could help minimize my breakouts.Now while I don't know of this detergent was the main factor to my maskne calming down (as I also switched to a silk mask), I definitely feel confident in saying that it helped.I hand wash my silk mask and so I only use the smallest amount of this detergent, so I feel like this bottle is going to last me forever.I absolutely love the smell of lavender, so I'm all for the scent, but if you're sensitive to strong smells, this might be a bit much for you.Overall, I would highly recommend trying if you're experiencing any mask me, or if you just wanted a more natural alternative for your everyday laundry detergent.
